name: Mifely Boxing
description:
Mifely is a black cat traped in a seemingly infinite mansion full with aggressive ghosts. Put on your trusty gloves and beat them until they disappear!

Fight with a multitude of colorful ghosts and duke it out to get a higher score than before in this Halloween themed boxing game.

Controls for PC/Mac:

  • Left: Left punch 
  • Right: Right punch 
  • Down: Block
  • Escape: Close game
